description: I’m a 22-year-old Full Stack Developer. I quit my job to build something really cool. Rather than making something for someone else, why not create something of your own? I’ve gone through the same process of creating a landing page every time I start a new project. So, I decided to build a boilerplate that helps me and others build landing pages in hours, not days. Now, I can validate my ideas first by building a landing page and then start working on the product. You can take advantage of this too. Get started now!
shortText:
Created a landing page 
 in 5 minutes
